tests:
from solution import max_time_to_report_issue

def test_example_1():
    n = 4
    r = 5
    t = 10
    coordinates = [(0, 0), (3, 4), (-3, -4), (6, 8)]
    assert max_time_to_report_issue(n, r, t, coordinates) == 2

def test_example_2():
    n = 3
    r = 2
    t = 5
    coordinates = [(0, 0), (5, 5), (-1, -1)]
    assert max_time_to_report_issue(n, r, t, coordinates) == -1

def test_single_node():
    n = 1
    r = 2
    t = 0
    coordinates = [(1, 1)]
    assert max_time_to_report_issue(n, r, t, coordinates) == 0

def test_nodes_all_reachable():
    n = 3
    r = 5
    t = 2
    coordinates = [(0, 0), (3, 4), (3, -4)]
    assert max_time_to_report_issue(n, r, t, coordinates) == 1

def test_impossible_reach():
    n = 3
    r = 1
    t = 5
    coordinates = [(0, 0), (10, 10), (20, 20)]
    assert max_time_to_report_issue(n, r, t, coordinates) == -1
